CustomField.description: ... when checked, this field mapping will be processed during multi-cloud integration events between B2C Commerce and Service Clouds. If un-checked, this field mapping will ignored during multi-cloud integration events.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ... when checked, this field mapping will be processed during multi-cloud integration events between B2C Commerce and Service Clouds. If un-checked, this field mapping will ignored during multi-cloud integration events.
CustomField.label: Enable for Multi-Cloud Integration
